channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Congress of Deputies
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Congress of Deputies

item.title: Opinion Poll by electoPanel for electomania.es, 26–30 January 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Popular: 18.7–21.6%
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español: 21.6–24.7%
  • Unidos Podemos: 13.7–16.3%
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 18.2–21.1%
  • Vox: 11.0–13.4%

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 21–25 January 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Popular: 21.4–26.7%
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español: 21.6–27.0%
  • Unidos Podemos: 14.4–19.0%
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 16.4–21.2%
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya: 1.9–4.0%
  • Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català: 0.7–2.1%
  • Euzko Alderdi Jeltzalea/Partido Nacionalista Vasco: 0.5–1.7%
  • Euskal Herria Bildu: 0.3–1.4%
  • Vox: 7.7–11.4%
